name: Bear Warfare
description:
Have you always wanted a quick way to burn through all your loose change on your phone?

Here it is: a Bear Warfare arcade game!

Bear Warfare is a touch-based game that has extremely simple game mechanics. Its gameplay revolves around a single mechanic of requiring players to deftly tap on the screen in order to keep the onscreen bear avatar in flight to collect coins while avoiding a series of obstacles.

Let your bear avatar fly and collect as many stars as possible through the other bears and obstacles.

Collecting each coin gets you one point.

The higher scores, it will have more new obstacles and you need a deftly tap.

Play and try to get the best score to challenge other players from all over the world on the social networks!

You only need to tap the screen to let your bear fly up: it's easy and fun!

Sounds easy, right?
Oh, one problem though... other stray bears are on the loose and flying on your phone screen!

Be careful, Flying Bears is grumpy; better not hit it unless you are deftly in hitting their balloon to make them fall!

In a few words: Avoid or make other bears fall by hitting on their balloon. Be aware of other bears and other obstacles ! Don't touch them!

Bear Warfare!

Free to Play:

The game is completely free to play! Woo! With that said, because computers have yet to evolve far enough to make games themselves, we still need to feed, clothe and I guess, pay our developers... so we do use a wee bit of advertising to monetize the experience. Nothing too obnoxious, just the occasional ad.
